title: "vdx dataset usage"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width=7, fig.asp=0.618)
library("breastCancerVDX")

library(gpowerr)

data(vdx)
expressions <- t(exprs(vdx))
```

## gpower function
```{r}
power <-
  gpower(
    data = expressions,
    k = 1,
    rho = 0.1,
    penalty = "l1",
    center = TRUE,
    block = FALSE,
    mu = 1
  )
summary(power)
print(power, print_zeros=FALSE)
```

## auto_gpower function
```{r}
auto <- auto_gpower(
  data = expressions,
  k = 2,
  prop_sparse = 0.5,
  penalty = "l1",
  block = FALSE,
  mu = 1
)
summary(auto)
print(auto, print_zeros=FALSE)
```
